item.title: Ukulele Fretboard - All Chromatic Notes up to Fret 12
item.description: This design shows the 12 frets of an ukulele fretboard and the positions of all notes of the chromatic scale C, D, Db, E, Eb, F, G, Gb, A, Ab, B, Bb. Knowing the notes on the fretboard is extremely helpful if you want to get creative with the uke. Get this

item.title: Ukulele Fretboard A Major Scale 12 Frets - Music Theory Design
item.description: This design shows 12 frets of an ukulele fretboard and the positions of the notes of the A major scale A, B, C♯, D, E, F♯, G♯. Each note has a distinct color. Knowing the notes on the fretboard is extremely helpful if you want to get creative with the uke.
